WPILib has a variable type called SwerveDrivePoseEstimator ( SwerveDrivePoseEstimator (WPILib API 2025.3.1)) which has a function called addVisionMeasurement ( PoseEstimator (WPILib API 2025.3.1))
Putting that in the periodic method of the drivetrain subsystem will use the data collected by your LimeLight to update your pose estimator.
